title: MD
biography: Ulf Svante von Euler was a Swedish physiologist and pharmacologist. He shared the Nobel Prize in Physiology or Medicine in 1970 for his work on neurotransmitters.
aiSummary: Ulf von Euler is a physiology specialist with an H-index of 12 at Karolinska Institute (Member). Has been published in Nature, Science (New York, N.Y.). Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
